about_the_game:
Can You Survive While Mining In Space?

Space Digger is an action roguelike game that will give you the thrill and excitement of a dangerous adventure. You will fight to collect valuable resources from dark and mysterious asteroid mines with your spaceship under your control. However, be careful, because you are not the only one on these planets!

With different abilities and development items, you must choose your strategy correctly and dig the "Great Mountains" completely or survive till the end!

In addition, new planets, enemy types, skill sets, spaceships and space markets that will be added to our game are coming soon!



Key Features:

- Giant miner saw blades that can damage enemies and ore mines.

- Opportunity to develop different strategies for each game with it's compelling game structure.

- Full gameplay with many types of enemies, mines and weapons.

- Mining Focused On Fragmentation Physics.

- Defeat the robot enemies that come upon you during gameplay and survive until you destroy the Great Mountains or survive till the end!

- Gather Supplies, gain experience and buy items in the shop between attacks!

- Accessibilty Options; Play as you like with the gamepad or keyboard and have fun!



Physics and Fragmentation
Space Digger features an advanced physics-based object fragmentation system. Shatter the ores to collect and sell the mineral resources extracted from within!
detailed_description:
TO JOIN OUR DISCORD SERVER!


SPACE DIGGER ON STEAM!


About the Demo

Can You Survive While Mining In Space?

Space Digger is an action roguelike game that will give you the thrill and excitement of a dangerous adventure. You will fight to collect valuable resources from dark and mysterious asteroid mines with your spaceship under your control. However, be careful, because you are not the only one on these planets!

With different abilities and development items, you must choose your strategy correctly and dig the "Great Mountains" completely or survive till the end!

In addition, new planets, enemy types, skill sets, spaceships and space markets that will be added to our game are coming soon!



Key Features:

- Giant miner saw blades that can damage enemies and ore mines.

- Opportunity to develop different strategies for each game with it's compelling game structure.

- Full gameplay with many types of enemies, mines and weapons.

- Mining Focused On Fragmentation Physics.

- Defeat the robot enemies that come upon you during gameplay and survive until you destroy the Great Mountains or survive till the end!

- Gather Supplies, gain experience and buy items in the shop between attacks!

- Accessibilty Options; Play as you like with the gamepad or keyboard and have fun!
